feed.title: SUMO: The Scene Understanding and Modeling Challenge Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest SUMO: The Scene Understanding and Modeling Challenge news and events.

entry.title: SUMO Challenge is announced
entry.summary: We are announcing the SUMO Challenge at the 2018 Bridges to 3D Workshop, organized by David Fouhey and several of his colleagues.
